title: Consumer Crackdown: Hi-tech scam targets cellphone sim cards - Live 5 News WCSC
content: Consumer Crackdown: Hi-tech scam targets cellphone sim cards  Live 5 News WCSC
description: The FBI said the scam starts when someone contacts you by phone or email pretending to be a representative from your mobile phone carrier. Once the fraudster gets your personal information, they call your service provider and report a lost or stolen sim card.
